member.name: T:Bunifu.UI.WinForms.BunifuShadowPanel
member.summary: Provides a snappy and improved panel with shadowed borders.

member.name: P:Bunifu.UI.WinForms.BunifuShadowPanel.PanelColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the panel's color.

member.name: P:Bunifu.UI.WinForms.BunifuShadowPanel.BorderColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the panel's border color.

member.name: P:Bunifu.UI.WinForms.BunifuShadowPanel.ShadowTopLeftVisible
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the top-left shadow will be visible.

member.name: P:Bunifu.UI.WinForms.BunifuShadowPanel.ShadowDepth
member.summary: Gets or sets the panel's shadow depth.
